component.name: CX Terminal
component.summary: AI-native GPU-accelerated terminal for CX Linux

description.p: CX Terminal is an AI-native terminal emulator with support for modern features such as fonts with ligatures, hyperlinks, multiple windows, tabs and split panes.
Configuration is expressed using Lua and many powerful functions are provided to help you customize your terminal to your workflow.
Built for CX Linux with AI integration, voice commands, and seamless integration with the CX ecosystem.
Initial release of CX Terminal, forked from WezTerm with CX Linux branding and AI integration points.
